item.title: WAKtheSAK game :)
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

You know, I made a MUCH shorter one with really high speeds.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 03:20:25 AM[/size][hr]You know, I made a MUCH shorter one with really high speeds.

[scar]
{for the game
http://www.go-skateboarding.com/USERIMAGES/wakthesak[1].swf
REwritten by geel9 }

Program WACKIT;
procedure WAK;
begin
Movemouse (1072, 394)
Holdmouse (1072, 394, true)
Movemouse (-560, 211)
Releasemouse (-560, 211, true)
wait(10000)
end;
begin
repeat
WAK;
until(false)
end.
[/scar]

item.title: WAKtheSAK game :)
item.dc:creator: @sk84lifesam sk84lifesam
item.description:
@sk84lifesam wrote:

hey guys this is my first attemt of a more complex script with procedures and stuff :eek: i think there is a few things wrong with it but tell me what you think

[code]{for the game
http://www.go-skateboarding.com/USERIMAGES/wakthesak[1].swf
written by Saml and thanks to thiefmn6092 for all your help :P}

Program WAKtheSAK;
const
a=0;

Procedure clickstart;
Begin
movemouse(609,364); //if you want to play on a diffrent site the window will be a diffrent size so you will need to change these coordinates
ClickMouse(609,364,true); //and here
end;

procedure Wak;
Begin;
MoveMouseSmooth(632,237); //and here
HoldMouse(632,237,true); //and here
MoveMouseSmooth(57,183); //and here
ReleaseMouse(57,183,true); //you can guess what im gonna say
wait(6000);
end;

procedure playagain;
Begin;
movemouse(358,298) //and here
clickmouse(358,298,true) //and here
end;

begin
clickstart;
wak;
repeat
until a<4;
playagain;
wak;
repeat
until a<4;
end.[/code]

Read full topic
